physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Upper abdominal ultrasound showed splenomegaly. Chest x-ray on the 6th day revealed a reticular pattern indicative of pneumonia. Chest CT on the 10th day revealed infiltration of both lungs.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: On the 6th day, the patient's clinical condition deteriorated with increasing oxygen needs and respiratory failure (acute respiratory distress syndrome), necessitating intubation.
